Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 3000

Config.Name: Require User Approval
Config.Description: Whether to require user approval before they can upload images

Config.Name: Allow Unauthenticated Users
Config.Description: Whether to allow unauthenticated users to access public routes

Config.Name: Minimum Password Length
Config.Description: Minimum password length required for users

Config.Name: User Password Requirements
Config.Description: Bitmask of password requirements. Sum of the following options: 1 (numbers), 2 (lowercase), 4 (uppercase), 8 (special characters).

Config.Name: Maximum Image Size
Config.Description: Maximum image size allowed to be uploaded, in MB. Cannot be more than 50M.

Config.Name: Strip EXIF Data
Config.Description: Whether to strip EXIF metadata from the uploaded images

Config.Name: Storage Provider
Config.Description: Storage provider to use for storing images

Config.Name: Local Storage - Image Path
Config.Description: Path to store images. Remove if not using local storage.

Config.Name: SMB Storage - Host
Config.Description: SMB host to connect to. Remove if not using SMB storage.

Config.Name: SMB Storage - Share
Config.Description: SMB share to connect to. Remove if not using SMB storage.

Config.Name: SMB Storage - Username
Config.Description: SMB username to connect with. Remove if not using SMB storage.

Config.Name: SMB Storage - Password
Config.Description: SMB password to connect with. Remove if not using SMB storage.

Config.Name: S3 Storage - Region
Config.Description: Amazon S3 region to connect to. Remove if not using S3 storage.

Config.Name: S3 Storage - Bucket
Config.Description: Amazon S3 bucket to connect to. Remove if not using S3 storage.

Config.Name: S3 Storage - Access Key ID
Config.Description: Amazon S3 access key ID to connect with. Remove if not using S3 storage.

Config.Name: S3 Storage - Secret Access Key
Config.Description: Amazon S3 secret access key to connect with. Remove if not using S3 storage.

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: Path to the database

Config.Name: Origin
Config.Description: Origin of the app

Config.Name: Swoole Worker Count
Config.Description: Number of Swoole workers
